casebody.data:
Gerard GRIMM, ON BEHALF OF Katherine A. GRIMM, Deceased, Petitioner
v.
WORKERS' COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION), Respondents No. 52 WAL 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. July 16, 2018

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 16th day of July, 2018, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
